objects.text:
• LIGHTWEIGHT FOLDING DESIGN
• STEREO BASS SOUND
• 1.5M NO-TANGLE CORD
• 40MM AUDIO DRIVER

product_details.name: RORSOU R10 Over-Ear Headphones with Microphone, Lightweight Folding Stereo Bass Headset with 1.5M No-Tangle Cord, Portable Wired Headphones for Smartphone Tablet Computer MP3 / 4 (Purple)
product_details.description: Headphones Jack: 3.5 mm Jack. Model Name: R10. Connectivity Technology: Wired. Age Range (Description): Adult, Kid. Material: Nylon,Plastic. Specific Uses For Product: Sports and Exercise, Home. Recommended Uses For Product: Calling. Compatible Devices: Smartphone,Tablet,laptops,Computer,MP3,MP4. Theme: Video Game. Control Type: Media Control. Cable Feature: Retractable. Item Weight: 9.9 ounces. Water Resistance Level: Not Water Resistant. Frequency Range: 20 Hz - 20,000 Hz. Unit Count: 1 Count. Control Method: Touch. Number of Items: 1. Audio Driver Type: Dynamic Driver. Audio Driver Size: 40 Millimeters. Earpiece Shape: Round. Series Number: 10. Is Autographed: No. Product Dimensions: 7.09 x 3.15 x 7.87 inches. Country of Origin: China.

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner showcases a tech-oriented design, featuring a split background comprised of deep purple and aqua blue quadrants overlaid with a white grid, highlighting a symmetrical and modern aesthetic. The composition includes one primary product image – a bold, futuristic headphone – placed prominently toward the right. At the top left, the large heading text layer (`heading`) is styled in a sleek, geometric font in white, immediately capturing attention. Below it, a secondary title (`subheading`) is rendered in aqua blue, reinforcing the branding. An informative feature list (`description`) is neatly aligned on the lower left. Pricing details (`price`) stand out in large white text, complemented by a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with embedded text (`cta`) that invites immediate engagement. Decorative dot clusters provide additional rhythm and dynamism.  

**Color Palette:**  
- Deep Purple: `#6A3D9A`  
- Violet Purple: `#5D359A`  
- Aqua Blue: `#00CED1`  
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of headphones with a vibrant and youthful color palette dominated by a bold **purple** (Hex: #7F3FBF) and accented with a striking **aqua teal** (Hex: #33E0C1). The purple forms the base structure, providing depth and richness, while the aqua teal accents along the headband lining, earcup rims, and brand logo highlight key design areas with energetic contrast. The colors are used in a complementary contrast, creating an eye-catching appeal without clashing. This well-balanced dual-color scheme can be used in an advertisement banner, combining deep royalty with tech-savvy brightness, projecting both vibrancy and modernity.
